info.title: SCANOSS License Service
info.description: License service provides license intelligence for software components.

get.summary: Get license information for a single software component.
get.description:
Examines source code, license files, and package metadata to determine which licenses apply to the component.
Returns license data in both individual SPDX license and SPDX expressions when determinable.

See: https://github.com/scanoss/papi/blob/main/protobuf/scanoss/api/licenses/v2/README.md?tab=readme-ov-file#getcomponentlicenses

parameters.name: purl
parameters.description: Package URL identifying the component to analyze.

parameters.name: requirement
parameters.description: Version constraint for component resolution when PURL lacks explicit version.

post.summary: Get license information for multiple software components in a single request.
post.description:
Examines source code, license files, and package metadata to determine which licenses apply to each component.
Returns license data in both individual SPDX license and SPDX expressions when determinable.

See https://github.com/scanoss/papi/blob/main/protobuf/scanoss/api/licenses/v2/README.md?tab=readme-ov-file#getcomponentslicenses

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Represents a list of software component to be analyzed by SCANOSS API services.
Allows analysis of multiple software components in a single API call, improving performance over individual requests.

get.summary: Get detailed metadata for a specific license by SPDX identifier.
get.description:
Provides comprehensive license information including SPDX registry data,
OSADL compliance metadata, license type classification, and official references.

post.summary: Returns the same message that was sent, used for health checks and connectivity testing

get.summary: Get compliance obligations and usage requirements for a specific license.
get.description:
Returns structured OSADL compliance data including use cases, obligations,
compatibility information, and patent hints for the specified license.

match.title:
SPDX License Matching Guidelines compliance result:
"true" - URL content matches SPDX template patterns (suitable for automated validation)
"false" - URL content doesn't match patterns, often due to additional text beyond original license
"N/A" - Matching validation not applicable
See: https://spdx.github.io/spdx-spec/v2.3/license-matching-guidelines-and-templates/

full_name.title:
Best human-readable license name (normalized when possible)
- For SPDX licenses: Official SPDX name (e.g., "MIT License", "GNU General Public License v2.0 only")
- For non SPDX licenses: Best normalized name from SCANOSS database or original statement

v2LicenseInfo.description:
Individual license identification with SPDX ID and human-readable name.

Provides basic license information including standardized identifiers and 
human-readable names for discovered licenses in software components.

v2LicenseType.description:
Classification of license types based on their usage restrictions and obligations.

Used to categorize licenses by their general characteristics and compliance requirements.

 - UNKNOWN: License type could not be determined or classified
 - PERMISSIVE: Allows liberal use with minimal restrictions (e.g., MIT, BSD, Apache)
 - COPYLEFT: Requires derivative works to be distributed under the same license (e.g., GPL, LGPL)
 - COMMERCIAL: Requires payment or commercial licensing agreement
 - PROPRIETARY: Proprietary license with restricted usage rights
 - PUBLIC_DOMAIN: No copyright restrictions, dedicated to public domain (e.g., CC0, Unlicense)

copyleft_clause.title: Indicates whether the license contains copyleft obligations requiring derivative works to use the same license

patent_hints.title: Indicates whether the license contains patent-related clauses or considerations

compatibility.title: List of licenses that are compatible for combination with this license

depending_compatibility.title: List of licenses that are compatible when depending on components with this license

incompatibility.title: List of licenses that are incompatible and cannot be combined with this license

use_cases.title: Structured use cases with specific obligations for different distribution scenarios

v2OSADL.description: OSADL compliance metadata providing license analysis and compatibility information.
